name: Quasit
resistances: Cold, Fire, Lightning; Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Scare (1/Day)
traits.description: One creature of the quasit's choice within 20 ft. must succeed on a DC 10 Wisdom saving throw or have the Frightened condition for 1 minute. The target repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

traits.name: Invisibility
traits.description: The quasit turns Invisible until it attacks, it uses Scare, or its Concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). Equipment the quasit wears or carries is also Invisible.

actions.name: Claw (Bite in Beast Form)
actions.description: *Melee:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 5 (1d4 + 3) Piercing plus 5 (2d4) Poison damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or have the Poisoned condition for 1 minute. The target repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.
